mapper.select: select pfl.financing_time_year from investment_institutions_project iip left join projects p on iip.project_id = p.ID left join project_financing_log pfl on iip.project_id = pfl.project_id where iip.investment_institutions_id = #{institutionId} and pfl.financing_time_year is not null group by pfl.financing_time_year order by pfl.financing_time_year desc
